QuestData.Title: [PH] Get Memories from Archives
QuestData.Description: We are going to need a little bit of preparation before we can face Voras.$b$bThe gorm of Ardenweald have developed special digestive juices that can isolate and dissipate anima in their food. It causes the devourers no small discomfort.$b$bFor a beast of that size, we will need a lot of the stuff to have any effect. Let us head to <HIVE MIND> and find a suitable one.$b$bAre you familiar with the use of a rod of reclamation? It is quite useful against the gorm. You can borrow mine.
